sections.heading: Referral, defined.Referral means a process whereby a nurse practitioner directs the patient to a physician or other health care practitioner for management of a particular problem or aspect of the patient's care
sections.text: SourceLaws 1996, LB 414, ยง 24;Laws 2000, LB 1115, ยง 40;Laws 2005, LB 256, ยง 55;R.S.Supp.
